languages.text: {n}Глухой и жестокий смех Инквизитора эхом расходится по заполненному трупами мостику.{/n} "Похоже, твоя игрушка отказывается танцевать так, как ты того жаждешь. Убогое зрелище, Хейнрикс. Стоило ли мне ожидать от тебя большего?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Глухой и жестокий смех Инквизитора эхом расходится по заполненному трупами мостику.{/n} "Похоже, твоя игрушка отказывается танцевать так, как ты того жаждешь. Убогое зрелище, Хейнрикс. Стоило ли мне ожидать от тебя большего?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: {n}The Inquisitor's harsh and cruel laughter echoes across the corpse-filled bridge.{/n} "It looks like your plaything is refusing to dance to your tune. It is pathetic, Heinrix. Should I have expected anything better from you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Глухой и жестокий смех Инквизитора эхом расходится по заполненному трупами мостику.{/n} "Похоже, твоя игрушка отказывается танцевать так, как ты того жаждешь. Убогое зрелище, Хейнрикс. Стоило ли мне ожидать от тебя большего?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor's harsh and cruel laughter echoes across the corpse-filled bridge.{/n} "It looks like your toy is refusing to dance the way you expect it to. It is pathetic, Heinrix. Should I have expect more from you?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor's harsh and cruel laughter echoes across the corpse-filled bridge.{/n} "It looks like your toy is refusing to dance the way you expect it to. It is pathetic, Heinrix. Should I have expect more from you?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor's harsh and cruel laughter echoes across the corpse-filled bridge.{/n} "It looks like your plaything is refusing to dance to the tune of your liking. It is pathetic, Heinrix. Should I have expected more from you?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor's harsh and cruel laughter echoes across the corpse-filled bridge.{/n} "It looks like your plaything is refusing to dance to the tune of your liking. It is pathetic, Heinrix. Should I have expected more from you?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor's harsh and cruel laughter echoes across the corpse-filled bridge.{/n} "It looks like your plaything is refusing to dance to your tune. It is pathetic, Heinrix. Should I have expected anything better from you?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inquisitor's harsh and cruel laughter echoes across the corpse-filled bridge.{/n} "It looks like your plaything is refusing to dance to your tune. It is pathetic, Heinrix. Should I have expected anything better from you?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: {n}Le rire dur et cruel de l'inquisiteur résonne sur la passerelle jonchée de cadavres.{/n} « Il semble que votre jouet refuse de danser à votre guise. C'est pathétique, Heinrix. Aurais-je dû m'attendre à mieux de votre part ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's harsh and cruel laughter echoes across the corpse-filled bridge.{/n} "It looks like your plaything is refusing to dance to your tune. It is pathetic, Heinrix. Should I have expected anything better from you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rire dur et cruel de l'inquisiteur résonne sur la passerelle jonchée de cadavres.{/n} « Il semble que votre jouet refuse de danser à votre guise. C'est pathétique, Heinrix. Aurais-je dû m'attendre à davantage de votre part ? »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: {n}大审判官发出了刺耳而残忍的大笑声，回荡在满是尸体的“旁听席”上。{/n}“看来，你的玩物不肯按照你喜欢的曲调跳舞。这可真是可悲啊，海因里希，我真的应该对你有更高的期望吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's harsh and cruel laughter echoes across the corpse-filled bridge.{/n} "It looks like your plaything is refusing to dance to your tune. It is pathetic, Heinrix. Should I have expected anything better from you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长发出了刺耳而残忍的大笑声，回荡在满是尸体的“旁听席”上。{/n}“看来，你的玩物不肯按照你喜欢的曲调跳舞。这可真是可悲啊，海因里希，我真的应该对你有更高的期望吗？”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: {n}異端審問官のとげとげしく残酷な笑い声が、死体だらけのブリッジに響き渡る。{/n}「あなたのオモチャは、あなたの好みに合わせて踊るのを拒んでいるようだ。哀れなものだな、ハインリックス。あなたにはもっと期待しておくべきだったか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's harsh and cruel laughter echoes across the corpse-filled bridge.{/n} "It looks like your plaything is refusing to dance to your tune. It is pathetic, Heinrix. Should I have expected anything better from you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官のとげとげしく残酷な笑い声が、死体だらけのブリッジに響き渡る。{/n}「あなたのオモチャは、あなたの好みに合わせて踊るのを拒んでいるようだ。哀れなものだな、ハインリックス。あなたにはもっと期待しておくべきだったか？」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: {n}Das raue und herzlose Gelächter des Inquisitors schallt über die mit Leichen gepflasterte Brücke.{/n} "Sieht so aus, als würde Euer Spielzeug sich weigern, nach Eurer Pfeife zu tanzen. Einfach nur jämmerlich, Heinrix. Hätte ich mehr von Euch erwarten sollen?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's harsh and cruel laughter echoes across the corpse-filled bridge.{/n} "It looks like your plaything is refusing to dance to your tune. It is pathetic, Heinrix. Should I have expected anything better from you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Das raue und herzlose Gelächter des Inquisitors schallt über die mit Leichen gepflasterte Brücke.{/n} "Sieht so aus, als würde Euer Spielzeug sich weigern, nach Eurer Pfeife zu tanzen. Einfach nur jämmerlich, Heinrix. Hätte ich mehr von Euch erwarten sollen?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: {n}La cruel risotada del inquisidor resuena por todo el puente alfombrado de cadáveres.{/n} «Parece que tu juguete se niega a bailar a tu son. Es patético, Heinrix. ¿Acaso debería haber esperado más de ti?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's harsh and cruel laughter echoes across the corpse-filled bridge.{/n} "It looks like your plaything is refusing to dance to your tune. It is pathetic, Heinrix. Should I have expected anything better from you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La cruel risotada del inquisidor resuena por todo el puente alfombrado de cadáveres.{/n} «Parece que tu juguete se niega a bailar al son que marcas. Es patético, Heinrix. ¿Quizá debería haber esperado más de ti?».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu'nun sert ve zalim kahkahası, cesetlerle dolu köprünün her yanında yankılanıyor.{/n} "Görünüşe göre oyuncağın dediklerini yapmıyor. Acınası bir durum Heinrix. Senden daha iyisini beklemekle hata mı yaptım?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's harsh and cruel laughter echoes across the corpse-filled bridge.{/n} "It looks like your plaything is refusing to dance to your tune. It is pathetic, Heinrix. Should I have expected anything better from you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Engizisyoncu'nun sert ve zalim kahkahası, cesetlerle dolu köprünün her yerinde yankılanıyor.{/n} "Görünüşe göre oyuncağın dediklerini yapmıyor. Acınası bir durum Heinrix. Senden daha iyisini beklemekle hata mı yaptım?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Vect+Kalckasar
